thread.section_title: HelloFresh US Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HelloFresh US | hellofresh.com | 13 of 265
thread.title: Jennifer

author: Jennifer
title: Jennifer
text: I love that the meals are portioned perfectly for the number of people you are serving. HelloFresh also saves me so much time because I don't have to plan my meals each week, go to the grocery store to find all the ingredients for individual recipes, and then potentially waste some food/money because I had to buy some items in bulk. I still get to feel the joy of cooking the food myself and the recipes are so good!
